General.Name: Nichols
General.Description: Nichols plc, together with its subsidiaries, engages in supply of soft drinks to the retail, wholesale, catering, licensed, and leisure industries in the United Kingdom. The company operates through two segments, Still and Carbonate. It offers still, cordial, carbonated, post-mix, and frozen drinks under the Vimto, Feel Good, Levi Roots, Starslush, ICEE, SLUSH OUPPiE, CocaCola, Coke, pepsi, IRN BRU, Old Jamaica, Ocean Spray, FRYST, DOUWE EGBERTS, and Sunkist brands. The company offers its products through grocery stores, wholesalers, and convenience store, as well as cinemas, theme parks, pubs, and restaurants. It also exports its products to the Middle East, Africa, and internationally. Nichols plc was founded in 1908 and is headquartered in Newton-le-Willows, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Laurel House, Newton-le-Willows, United Kingdom, WA12 0HH
